text: Egha Atrivim Nebukatnesar mɨdorozir gumazir gavgaviba bar me inigha ghu, men dɨbobonim 7,000. Egha a uaghan gumazir avɨrir bizir igharagha garibar ingarir fofozim itiba ko gumazir ainɨn bizibar ingariba sara ini, men dɨbobonim 1,000ɨn tu. Gumazir kaba bar gumazir gavgaviba, ezɨ me mɨdorozir gumazibar ingangarim damuan tughatɨ.
